jroutine-androidstream 6.0.0

Parallel programming on the go.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11.stream
Streams implementation classes specific to the Android platform.
com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.stream
Streams implementation classes with support for Android compatibility library.
Parallel programming on the go.

Android customization of stream-like routine concatenation based on the jroutine-stream library.

The code below shows how it is possible to load an image from the network in a background thread, by letting the library automatically handle any change in the configuration. Note that the very same examples can be re-written using JRoutineLoaderCompat class and a FragmentActivity.

Example 1: via loader stream.

Note that, in order to avoid leaks, the function is declared with a static scope. 

    
        public class MainActivity extends Activity {

            private static final String IMAGE_URI = "http://...";

            private static final Function<URI, Bitmap> sLoaderFunction = (uri) -> {

                try {
                    final URLConnection urlConnection = uri.toURL().openConnection();
                    final InputStream inputStream = urlConnection.getInputStream();
                    try {
                        final Bitmap bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(inputStream);
                        if (bitmap == null) {
                            throw new IOException("failed to decode bitmap");
                        }

                        return bitmap;

                    } finally {
                        inputStream.close();
                    }

                } catch (final IOException e) {
                    throw new InvocationException(e);
                }
            };

            @Override
            protected void onCreate(final Bundle savedInstanceState) {

                super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
                setContentView(R.layout.main_layout);
                final ImageView imageView = (ImageView) findViewById(R.id.image);
                LoaderStreams.streamOf(uri)
                             .with(loaderFrom(this))
                             .loaderConfiguration()
                             .withFactoryId(11)
                             .setConfiguration()
                             .map(sLoaderFunction)
                             .bind(new TemplateOutputConsumer<Bitmap>() {

                                 @Override
                                 public void onError(@NotNull final RoutineException error) {

                                     final Throwable cause = error.getCause();
                                     Toast.makeText(MainTestActivity.this, (cause != null) ?
                                             cause.getMessage() : "Cannot load image",
                                             Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
                                 }

                                 @Override
                                 public void onOutput(final Bitmap bitmap) {

                                     imageView.setImageBitmap(bitmap);
                                 }
                             });
            }
        }
